website_summaries.verdict: Though it has a budget-friendly price, it's not as reliable as other models on our shortlist. Channel selection is decent; set-up may be challenging.
pros: Basic and affordable w/an impressive 500 channels and clear sound when the reception is good
Its weather alert feature, clock, and FM radio capability add to its value
cons: Users have reported that it is confusing to program and doesn't pick up much activity in some areas without adding another antenna

customer_reviews.title: The Frequency #'s
customer_reviews.text: I'm not able to listen to the scanner due to not having frequency #'s, I was told that where i purchase this scanner should of provided me with a mllist of #s since it's not digital..So can you provide me with a list or I would have to return if I can listen to it.. Thank You Lorraine Lopez
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Uniden BC365CRS Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the reception in the area in which I live (semi-rural) using only the provided telescoping antenna. I especially like the Limit Search feature of this radio. This scanner is similar to the Whistler WS1025 which does not have the Limit Search feature which determined which scanner I ultimately purchased. Opinion: Unneeded features in this scanner — alarm clock and FM radio.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Really nice scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner! Really like the weather scan feature. Programming is easy but it does require some extra steps. Once set up it works as advertised. I listen to it mostly at night when the activity is most active. I'm using the auto scan and I'm scanning about ten freq,s or so....any more and you might get only partial transmission/conversation. Overall I like this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: seahawker

customer_reviews.title: Useless! Not digital.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Mom for Christmas. Couldn’t get anything. Finally took it to an electronics business to get it programmed. Told me that police, fire etc all going to digital. It’s useless and too late to return it. These should not be for sale!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews here, I wasn't sure what to expect. I received my Uniden BC365CRS yesterday, and it is very easily programmable. It took me about 10 minutes to input my scanner codes and then it was scanning beautifully. I highly recommend this unit to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner
customer_reviews.text: First would like to say it was easy to program once you did the first frequency Push E button put in frequency wanted and the Push E again I’m 70 years old and it was easy As for the scanner it works excellent on analog channels in my rural NJ area The antanae is good but replaced it with a Diamond RC77a antanae used on a Mobil scanner Excellent reception now Used a bcn right angle female to male connector
customer_reviews.author: Henry Mcclary Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It is not for 800 mhz police calls .
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about the scanner - like tone ,selectivity ,uniden got all of the things in common in one sector . I think I am a genius ( my girlfriend thinks i am a genius) , but I still haven't learned the skills of programming it yet . I've watched videos , read the instructions and I feel like I am unlearned and experimented with it -but to no avail .I would recommend this to my friends .
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: nice police scanner
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to figure out how to work at first. It was confusing. Once i figured it out though it was a nice scanner. It picked up a lot of stations.
customer_reviews.author: elisha

customer_reviews.title: The favorite part for my husband is that if he tries ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. The favorite part for my husband is that if he tries to duplicates a number it will not allow it. So his 300 channels turned into a 150 for our area. The sound is clear and the static minimal.
customer_reviews.author: D'Nanna

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed !!! Hard to set up and operate .
customer_reviews.text: This a analog scanner , witch they don’t tell you on the ad . So basically useless its like having a analog tv when there sending digital signals useless . Spend the extra money and buy a digital scanner . 🤨☹️
customer_reviews.author: Mathew.Swanigan

customer_reviews.title: Electronic Dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking that it would pick up police, ems, fire transmissions, nothing but dead air. Unless you live in Mayberry, your chances are slim to none that you will be using this for anything other than just another useless contributor to a higher electric bill. All police departments are going digital which means if you want to find out what’s going on in your neighborhood, you’re going to have to spring for a much higher model
customer_reviews.author: kmcintyre1

customer_reviews.title: it's a keeper for me
customer_reviews.text: instruction manual not so good but a little button pushing needs practice. the instructions don't follow through with all necessary scenario steps necessary. mine does run on batteries. three fresh ones lasted a touch over 15 hours. reception is real good with magnetic base antenna up on top my of bird cage and it's downstairs ground level + maybe six feet higher than ground level. audio quality is as expected pretty good. uniden should expand on this form factor. it's an attractive rig. a more complete frequency spectrum radio would be rather nice to own with the scanner ability as well. i seldom give five stars and didn't think it deserves five but four reflects needed expansions.
customer_reviews.author: rayray

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Thought when it says digital and up to date- I thought it was a newer version- didn’t work with the local dept
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Noel

customer_reviews.title: This is a good police scanner radio at a reasonable price of about ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good police scanner radio at a reasonable price of about $87.00. It started picking up fire/police/ambulance calls right of of the box in my hometown area of the City of Pottsville, Schuylkill County, Pennsylvania, in the east central part of Pennsylvania.. I would highly recommend this scanner to people interested in a good police scanner but who do not want to pay a big price. Thank you, David P. Carroll, City of Pottsville, Schuylkill Co., Penna. 4/23/2018 Schuylkill County, Penna. is pronounced scuyl kihl
customer_reviews.author: David P. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: He spends a great deal of time in there
customer_reviews.text: My husband has this all hooked u in his computer room. He spends a great deal of time in there. He is figuring it out more each day. He likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Expensive table weight.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money if your looking for something like a “police scanner” in most big cities. I bought it for a gift for my mother, and the police / Fire and EMS use digital frequencies or whatever and this doesn’t pick those up. So it’s outdated for listening to scanners. If that’s what your looking for just download the app Broadcastify that works great.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in Bc365CRS uniden scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Uniden bearcat scanner BC365 May 22, 2020 for Fathers Day gift in June. Website stated only 2 in stock. Gift was opened on June 22, 2020, attempted to program it on June 23, 2020. Cannot get any part of it to work and this is the 4th bearcat scanner we have owned. Attempted to return it but vendor said it's past 30 days!!!! Now what do we do................short of being out $100.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner. Only thing I had trouble with was most codes are more than 6 digits, as for this scanner only allows 6 digits. But after researching, you don’t have to enter all numbers when programming codes. Just enter what you can. Example: Code is 627.55107 then for this scanner you’ll just enter 627.551 and still works!
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I could not program in the frequencies for our area. I bought a refurbished one and it came with no instructions. I went online to program it and it didn't accept the frequencies I tried to program in. I know they are the frequencies in our area because our old scanner used them. I was hoping to upgrade our old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a scanner for a long time. I decided to buy one. After looking at the different types and styles, I decided on this one. It has a lot of cool features and more channels then I'll ever use. I found the set up directions weren't as clear as they should be, but it didn't take long to figure out. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckster

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive scanner
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a more complete scanner. That's why I returned it after 3 days and bought the Whistler WS 1095. The Whistler is definitely more complex but I was able to programs it according to the instructions and "hear" traffic in less than an hour after the box arrived. I di d have the advantage of owning a Radio Shack Pro 2051 1000 Channel scanner for several years.
customer_reviews.author: LSvach

customer_reviews.title: Uniden Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Love this scanner. Very easy to set up and listen to police and fire department calls. If it's your hobby, you'll love it. If it is something you are just considering, do it, it's worth the money. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good listening to.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me in touch with the outside world. Since I'm in a wheelchair and don't get out. During the snowstorms listening to the local townships doing the roads it brings back to my early days of listening to the radio programs.
customer_reviews.author: Vonlu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for. We listen to the police scanner for our area all the time, I had an app downloaded on my phone but whoever had our channel on the broadcast website took it down in February so we decided to purchase another scanner. We use to buy them at radioshack until it closed down a few years ago. Finding this scanner here on Amazon was amazing and our area still uses analog so its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: xWe SwaYx

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller service.
customer_reviews.text: Great transaction. Excellent seller (Police Scanner Outlet), fast shipping. Great product and value according its specifications and proposes. As ever, excellent Amazon policies. Best base radio scanner if your local area still runs on analog and you are looking for an easy to use base police scanner. It also features FM broadcasting for entertainment. It is a complete package in itself as a base radio scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Just got in today sure it's fine 20 years ago scanner does not work at all I i looked up local scanning feq programmed then been scanning the 10 same ones for 4 hours not one thing has came over basically a over priced alarm clock and weather radio I believe I will be asking for a refund
customer_reviews.author: stevy

customer_reviews.title: Needing help.
customer_reviews.text: We are finding that this item is difficult to program. The instructions are not very helpful but since we are older it could just be difficult for us. Everything else wirks very well so I have dicided that it's just us.lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scanner because of the price. It doesn’t take a computer degree to program it, it has battery backup and 500 channels.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Have always bought bearcat when buying a scanner. Wanted it for local programming. Have had a bit of a problem getting it programmed to my local stations, and still working on doing so. Instructions a bit difficult to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda S

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Otsego and surrounding Counties, NY
customer_reviews.text: Fire, EMS, State Police, all work very well. This model is identical to my previous 100 channel scanner. But now does 500 channels. Never did fill the 100 channels. Received within 2 days of order. I recommend PoliceScannerOutlet.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald F. Ranc

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up and picks up calls.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to program. I found the codes online and in 5 minutes it was set up. I live in a rural area and am able to get everything: fire, ems, state and sherif. I have a hand held radio shack that is 20 + years old. Still love it but I don't like buying batteries for it. Haven't needed it for clock or radio but will give it a go. This is great scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Sorry. Can't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up anything. Live right in the middle of town.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence D.

customer_reviews.title: Backup batteries are a plus
customer_reviews.text: The scanner arrived very quickly and undamaged. It was easy to program with local frequencies. Purchased it because it has backup batteries and we will be able to use in event of another massive blackout or outage. We live in an area of no cell service and wildfire danger so a reliable source of info on an emergency is vital.
customer_reviews.author: Shelleyel

customer_reviews.title: old school but works well
customer_reviews.text: The scanner does not work with digital signals but where I live we are not digital. Would probably not be helpful if you lived in a metropolitan area where digital signals are used.
customer_reviews.author: Dean E. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Alert: Frequency coverage
customer_reviews.text: I value Uniden products and this scanner is built well and solid! However it does not cover above 512 MHz and no AM broadcast coverage. I'm not going to purchase this model again.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Blosser

customer_reviews.title: Very happy...
customer_reviews.text: Works great have been listening non-stop since I purchased, am looking to order a speaker to run from bedroom to put in wall downstairs to hear all local police,fire,Em's problems in my nieborhood...best price...will upgrade to digital in future and will reorder threw same supplier...thx
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this scanner for nearly a month now. It is a little tricky to program the frequencies but just take your time with it. Other than that this is a great scanner. I have been tuning in on the local law enforcement channels. This recently came in handy when a felon escaped from our nearby jail. We were ready long before our local news told us to be on alert. This scanner is getting good reception and it is plenty loud if you need to turn it up. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: javier007

customer_reviews.title: Clear
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Put it in my office at the airport with an external antenna. Can pick up at least 45 miles out.
customer_reviews.author: ntsb

customer_reviews.title: Great deals from Amazon Warehouse!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much to Amazon Warehouse! I'm absolutely not afraid to order used or reconditioned, or open box items! Every time that I have, it's been just fine. I already have the police scanner programed and running. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Flintstone from Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t deal with I Save.
customer_reviews.text: Great Scanner. Received 2 of them as gifts. One was sealed and everything was included. Other one missing owners manual and had seen to be open to get manual out. Had hole in box from antenna connection . Would not deal with the Company I Save who was shipping this item.
customer_reviews.author: Wallyworld

customer_reviews.title: Scanner radio
customer_reviews.text: It makes a loud noise and can’t stop it after on all day. Has anyone experienced this? I’ve had it one year. Probably not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but forgot a lot of police use digital encryption so does not work for that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. The last one of this type lasted 25 years for this firefighter family
customer_reviews.author: Allisa

customer_reviews.title: Watch You-Tube tutorial before use
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Too complicated to figure out initially using pamplet. You-tube made that part much easier.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany  coffer

customer_reviews.title: Is working well so far.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed harder to program than we thought it would be. After getting through programming, this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and is easy to program
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly for what we wanted it for. Gets all the channels that we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cole E.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Its was easy to program after watching ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Its was easy to program after watching a few videos. Picks up a lot of chatter, especially on nights and weekends in my area.
customer_reviews.author: chris c sirignano

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS
customer_reviews.text: THIS SCANNER IS EASY TO USE AND WORKS WELL... GET THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Need a weather radio this is both scanner, radio and weather
customer_reviews.text: After you figure how to work it's great. When put on weather channel it alerts you and keeps you updated in your area.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L

customer_reviews.title: Product is in great shape and enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive in wonderful shape and very good shape. The product is something I was looking for in a scanner and other things in the product.
customer_reviews.author: joseph blanche

customer_reviews.title: Analong scanner
customer_reviews.text: It was as advertised and described, it meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sommerfeld

customer_reviews.title: Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should had to youtube how to set it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Would love to be able to use this but cannot figure out how to program it. Instructions are not are not helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased a Uniden product before and was satisfied. If not for hurting the feelings of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this item as a gift and it turned out to be nothing as advertised. Have purchased a Uniden product before and was satisfied. If not for hurting the feelings of the person who purchased it for me, i would have returned it and got their money back or trashed it. Terrible to program, lose stations, ect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is not worth the money. Hard to program. Sent this item back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn King

customer_reviews.title: SCAN AWAY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM AND SELLER SECOND ITEM OF THIS TYPE I HAVE OWNED THANK YOU BASIL OWENS

customer_reviews.title: Your numbers... code's.
customer_reviews.text: I like the scanner, it gives me more knowledge. Getting a license maybe in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer's

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Our hand held scanner died and this was our replacement- it’s easy to put the frequencies in and has good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this scanner. Easy to program and great sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bought this scanner for my wife 'cause the one she ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this scanner for my wife 'cause the one she had was old. she really likes listening to her scanner. she gives it a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Not happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Barely picks up any channel and when it does it’s hard to here ... plus you send me a card for free gift field out never got the FREE gift now scanner won't pick up channels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Works great! We have had to 7 months now with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Maisie Sikkema

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little figuring out for someone who doesn't use computers
customer_reviews.author: DouglasHoman

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to program and scans really well. It is turned on day and night with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Drayer

customer_reviews.title: Great little scanner
customer_reviews.text: Buy with confidence, great little scanner for the money. Took about 5 minutes to find and store 20+ interesting channels after unboxing. I don't know how people can say this is too complicated to use. Reception and clarity are great, and delivery was super fast... It's a 5 for me!
customer_reviews.author: Devlin Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Not a very easy product
customer_reviews.text: No instructions. Cant figure out how to use it. Cant find any channels. Doesnt come in at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cornock.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product! It does not have ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! It does not have a return option and its analog which does not work in most areas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for someone not sure of quality or sound yet
customer_reviews.author: david hale

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to start up.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was a Fire Chief before his death and I still like to know where they are going and this has worked great sense I got it all hooked up. It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Freytag

customer_reviews.title: veey Affordable and great product .
customer_reviews.text: Great great product . The things I liked the most : it came ready to use hooked it in and pushed a couple buttons and was already listening to cops and fire and ambulance . The things I liked the least : there isn’t anything that I like the least .
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: It is not hard to program once you get the codes for your area.
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong signal we live in a old trailer it’s all metal and we get good signal with it. It is easy to program once you get the police/fire/emt/weather codes for your area. We love love our scanner
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jemison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit .it’s great this ,unit has been around for sale for a while , great I just bought this one new so far so good

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to pick up signal. Not the problem of the seller probably my area but product was what it's supposed to be
customer_reviews.author: Aldo Funari

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased I was unsure that the scanner had its own antennae so I purchased one separately. When it arrived it did have antennae. It would be helpful to list in description that it does come with antennae; otherwise great product, good customer service and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Picks up local stuff okay, I didn't program it and its still fun. There is some loud beeping/alarm that goes off randomly in the middle of the night...I didn't figure out why yet
customer_reviews.author: 2Doves

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the best.for excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Personal use. Amazon has excellent service you can depend on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not what the product makers claim
customer_reviews.text: Never used it could never get it programmed gave it to charity sound was horrible and screeches do not recommend it for you
customer_reviews.author: alicia trathen

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My wife listen to it all day, I have had it for a year and it works great, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Edward B

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: All it is is a bunch of noise. Very hard to hear what they say. I found out by the captain of our PPD, most police calls do not go out on scanners anymore but through the computer. Many are not available to the public. A long time ago it was through scanners
customer_reviews.author: DeborahArnett

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the scanner. Lots of channels and great audio output. I am on an IMAT team and monitor many area agencies to maintain situational awareness and this is a great radio! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I finally figured how to get it to scan, it don't pick up police but I get fire/emergency, so that's good
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: easy to program
customer_reviews.text: easy to program and set up. has a good speaker for in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The instruction booklet make this a breeze to set up, and the sound quality is fantastic! Especially for such a modestly priced scanner. The only reason I didn't want to give it five stars is because it doesn't, to my knowledge, have a function allowing you to set a repeating sleep mode. This would be really handy, as it would allow you to have the scanner automatically silence at night. The radio works well and the automatic weather radio (toggled on and off by a sliding switch) is a nice feature. I used [...] to find my frequencies, and had everything programmed in about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Nice once set up
customer_reviews.text: My niece had to set this up for me because I couldn’t figure it out but now that’s it’s set up it’s nice, I have only used the scanner to hearpolice calls etc
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Blumenschein

customer_reviews.title: ... a little to be desired but the radio works fine. I use it to scan the Ham repeaters ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions leave a little to be desired but the radio works fine. I use it to scan the Ham repeaters that are important to me and save the batteries on my handheld radio until I need to transmit.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but bad power supply
customer_reviews.text: I really like the scanner however the power supply cord has already failed. I have one for another Uniden scanner that I’m currently using.
customer_reviews.author: Arley Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fully loaded. I use it for Ham Radio signals, the space station, and air traffic in my area. Also got my county wide emergency bands. Still gathering frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hanvy

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Received the item one day early, worked as expected, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: I went just past the 30 days to return. I got this for my grandmother and it doesnt program. I watched so many videos on how to program to the channels you want. Nothing came through except weather. So disappointed and a waste of $$$
customer_reviews.author: samantha duerr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value and recieved it in a good time frame!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I love uniden only thing though is it didn't have railroad presets other than that awesomeness on sound and reception. And I live in a basement apartment
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ramous

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are a little tuff to follow but over all is doing what I wanted it to do

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Manual tells you where to lookup local frequencies. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Breeding

customer_reviews.title: Whole lot of channels. You may want to make sure you need this many
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was preprogrammed. Reading the info online it was not. But it's ok. I didn't need all those channels. After learning how to program it great.

customer_reviews.title: AM Glad I was at home
customer_reviews.text: Am glad I was at home who ever dropped my package off didn't ring my door bell😡

customer_reviews.title: Not maybe your problem! But I can only get ...
customer_reviews.text: Not maybe your problem! But I can only get 1 channel out of 500! Maybe have to go with a different scanner that may pick up more! Any ideas would be helpful for my local area in fond du lac Wisconsin! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the scanner just wish I could get more with it but must be where I live

customer_reviews.title: Works great, hard to program
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner although very hard to program. Had to obtain help from a radio specialist. Over all happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Kent gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves loves loves it but it drives me nuts. lol
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Decent scanner, but nothing spectacular.
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the sound quality on distant signals even with external speakers. Closer transmissions are ok. It doesn't beat the sound quality of my old Channel Master scanner I used.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mathews

product_meta.title: Uniden BC365CRS 500 Channel Scanner and Alarm Clock with Snooze, Sleep, and FM Radio with Weather Alert, Search Bands Commonly used for Police, Fire/EMS, Aircraft, Radio, and Marine Transmissions
product_meta.description: Style:Channel ScannerThe BC365CRS is a multi-featured conventional channel scanner. Easily enter and store frequencies for police, fire/emergency, marine, air and more into 500 channels over ten banks. The scanner also features AM/FM clock radio with snooze and NOAA weather broadcasts. Receives conventional channels on the following frequencies: AM Broadcast (530-1700 KHz) (25-54 MHz) FM Broadcast (88-108 MHz) (108-174 MHz) (225-380 MHz) (406-512 MHz). In scanner mode press to start a limit search or to resume searching. In service select mode press to select police service. In fm mode, press to select the fm1 from memory bank. Note-if scanner receives interference or electrical noise move the scanner or its antenna away from the source. Recommend changing the height or angle of the antennas. Avoid placing the scanner in direct sunlight or near heating elements or vents
feature_bullets: Includes 500 channels in 10 Banks for scanning local public safety and other interesting frequencies.
Easily search bands commonly used for Police, Fire/EMS, Aircraft, Amateur Radio, and Marine transmissions.
Built-in FM radio with 30 FM presets, lets you listen to your local radio stations.
Built in Alarm Clock lets you wake to your favorite FM station, a weather channel, or scanning. Also has Snooze and Sleep.
Weather Scan with Alert, listen to local weather conditions and be alerted when hazardous conditions arise.
Large clear LCD backlit display is easy to read at night.
The buttons are nicely laid out for ease of use, so there's no fumbling around in the dark.
